items.name: Academic/ Honor Society
items.description: Organizations that base their mission and events around academic interests and events. Often affiliated with a departmental, national or international honor society.

items.name: Activism/ Advocacy
items.description: Organizations that support a specific cause or proposal; often using noticeable actions to bring about political or social change.

items.name: Community Awareness/Service
items.description: Organizations that conduct community service outreach, programs or events for local, national or international communities.

items.name: Cultural Organizations
items.description: Organizations that celebrate and/or educate about a specific cultural community.

items.name: Fraternities and Sororities
items.description: Organizations founded on shared values of academic excellence, service, personal development, leadership, multiculturalism, and brotherhood/sisterhood. These organizations may be single gender or designed for a specific occupation, and are typically affiliated with a national organization.

items.name: Graduate Organizations
items.description: Membership is geared toward graduate students and/or the graduate majors.

items.name: Leisure Activities
items.description: Organizations that offer activities that promote relaxation and shared hobbies.

items.name: Media Organizations
items.description: Organizations that offer participation in many forms of media such as radio, newspaper, magazines, journalism, and online publishing.

items.name: Performance Organizations
items.description: Organizations that perform on/off campus. Performances can be theatrical, vocal, dance, spoken word, and more.

items.name: Religious/Spiritual
items.description: Organizations that celebrate and/or educate about a specific religion or spiritual community.

items.name: Sport Clubs
items.description: Organizations that fill the void between intramural sports and intercollegiate athletics. A sport club may be oriented toward competition, instructional, or recreational purposes.

items.name: HSC Clubs- RSOM
items.description: Clubs primarily functioning at the Health Science Center, specifically in the Renaissance School of Medicine

items.name: HSC Clubs- School of Dental Medicine
items.description: Clubs primarily functioning at the Health Science Center, Specifically in the School of Dental Medicine

items.name: HSC Clubs- School of Health Professions
items.description: Clubs primarily functioning at the Health Science Center, Specifically in the School of Health Professions

items.name: HSC Clubs -School of Social Welfare
items.description: Clubs primarily functioning at the Health Science Center, Specifically in the School of Social Welfare

items.name: HSC Club: Public Health Program
items.description: Organizations who are affiliated with the Public Health Program in Health Sciences
